post:
**MicroNodes Shared Web Hosting Hosting (https://micronodes.net/shared-hosting)**

 **Black Friday Offers Rolling into Cyber Monday! (Valid through 11/27/2017)**

MicroNodes Hosting is a hosting provider founded in 2016. We are dedicated to providing high quality colocation, VPS, dedicated servers, shared hosting and Minecraft servers. We used to buy VPS servers ourselves and hosted prior to founding our company. We understand the everyday need for excellent service which is what we want to provide to you at an affordable price. We have company owned hardware colocated in ColoinSeattle’s Datacenter's Facilities. WoW Rack offers a good network blend with many carriers.


We will do price matching if it is practical. You can email billing@micronodes.net to find out more details. 

 
 **Website: https://micronodes.net**
 
 **100 MB Test File: https://micronodes.net/testfile/100MB.zip**
 
 **Test IP:** 104.192.101.3

 **Looking Glass:** http://lg.micronodes.net
 
 **Node Specs:**
 
  •2 x Intel Xeon L5640 (6 cores/12 threads each CPU)
 
  •64GB DDR3 ECC RAM
 
  •4x 1TB RAID 10 Array of Premium Western Digital HDDs
 
  •10Gbps Fiber Uplink

 
 All plans come with 20Gbps TCP DDoS Protection with an L7 filter to keep your server safe and online.
 

 
**Plans and Pricing: Use promo code for bfweb40 for 40% off recurring!**

 
 **• Web Plan Micro:**
 
 -Suitable for small blogs or single use websites.
 
 -1GB RAID Storage
 
 -10GB Bandwidth
 
 -10Gb/s Port
 
 -20Gb/s TCP DDoS Protection with L7 Filter
 
 -5 FTP & Email Accounts
 
 -Unlimited Databases
 
 -5 Subdomains
 
 -5 Addon Domains
 
 -Seattle, Washington Location
 
 -$0.60/Month with bfweb40 promo code.
 
 -Order Link: https://client.micronodes.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=19
 

 **• Web Plan Regular:**
 
 -Suitable for normal sites that have minimal daily traffic. Works well with blogs and small eCommerce stores.

 -15GB RAID Storage
 
 -200GB Bandwidth
 
 -10Gb/s Port
 
 -20Gb/s TCP DDoS Protection with L7 Filter
 
 -10 FTP & Email Accounts
 
 -Unlimited Databases
 
 -10 Subdomains
 
 -10 Addon Domains
 
 -Seattle, Washington Location
 
 -$2.10/Month with bfweb40 promo code.
 
 -Order Link: https://client.micronodes.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=20
 

 **• Web Plan Plus:**
 
 -Suitable for full scale eCommerce stores and medium traffic sites.
 
 -25GB RAID Storage
 
 -400GB Bandwidth
 
 -10Gb/s Port
 
 -20Gb/s TCP DDoS Protection with L7 Filter
 
 -25 FTP & Email Accounts
 
 -Unlimited Databases
 
 -25 Subdomains
 
 -25 Addon Domains
 
 -Seattle, Washington Location
 
 -$4.20/Month with bfweb40 promo code.
 
 -Order Link: https://client.micronodes.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=21
 

 **For any questions or modifications to plans needed contact billing@micronodes.net or reply to this thread.**
